article.headline: OREGON 65, NOTRE DAME 61
article.story: SOUTH BEND, Ind. (AP) -- Chris Quinn scored 25 points to lead No. 20 Notre Dame to an 80-61 exhibition victory over Quincy on Wednesday night. Notre Dame went on a 16-0 run in the first half in taking a 49-30 halftime lead. The Irish led 60-36 at the 13:31 mark of the second half then the Hawks chipped away and cut it to 12. But the Irish closed the game with an 18-11 run. Chris Thomas had 16 points and six rebounds for the Irish. Jordan Roth and Phil Gettinger led Quincy with 11 points each. The Irish were 11-of-22 from 3-point range, including five by Quinn and four by Thomas. The Irish open the regular season at home on Nov. 19 against Harvard.
